original_text: And the likeness of their faces was the same faces which I saw by the river of Chebar, their appearances and themselves: they went every one straight forward.
korean_text: 그 얼굴의 형상은 내가 그발 강 가에서 보던 얼굴이며 그 모양과 그 몸도 그러하며 각기 곧게 앞으로 가더라

sentences.original_text: And the likeness of their faces was the same
faces which I saw by the river of Chebar
they went every one straight forward
